attributes.action: Stop the deportation of asylum seekers (and 'migrants') to Rwanda.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament should prevent this wrong-headed and cruel scheme from going ahead, and call on the Government to develop legal means for asylum seekers to come to this country as a matter of urgency.
attributes.background: Rwanda, under President Kagame, has come under significant criticism for human rights abuses. It's record on asylum seekers is poor, The scheme will cost billions and be ineffective. It's a unrealistic, expensive and inhumane option.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
